Title: Vanguard-Raptors with Hurricane Crossbows
Legend: For some Vanguard-Raptors, Sigmar’s work can only be done by annihilating his foes in clinically rapid succession. Their hurricane crossbows facilitate this, able to unleash a withering salvo of death that few can withstand.
Intro: Each model in a Vanguard-Raptors with Hurricane Crossbows unit is armed with a Hurricane Crossbow and Heavy Stock.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Vanguard Justicar Conclave

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Raptor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Hurricane Crossbow.

Rules.Name: Rapid Fire
Rules.Fluff: A unit of Vanguard-Raptors can lay down a bombardment of fire to obliterate the foe.
Rules.Rule: If an attack made with a Hurricane Crossbow scores a hit, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
